short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare the prices in the Bluepoints store against their real Amazon price.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever been shopping around with bluepoints and wondered how much the item you were viewing actually costs? Well, then this is just the extension for you! It works by checking the Amazon price of items while you browse the BluePoints catalog.
